ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( OR(OR(LEFT( Email ,4)="info",LEFT( Email ,7)="contact",LEFT( Email ,6)="Career"),OR(RIGHT( Email ,5)="games",RIGHT( Email ,6)="garden",RIGHT( Email ,5)="glass",RIGHT( Email ,4)="free",RIGHT( Email ,4)="talk")),True,False)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: email does not starts with info@, contact@, Career@ or this l email is not allowed for lead
